qas.question: What ship runs between Saint Helena and Cape town on 5 day voyages?
What year was the RMS Saint Helena supposed to be decommissioned?
What needs to be completed before the RMS Saint Helena can be decommissioned?

context: The ship <a0_0>RMS Saint Helena<a0_0/> runs between St Helena and Cape Town on a 5-day voyage, also visiting Ascension Island and Walvis Bay, and occasionally voyaging north to Tenerife and Portland, UK. It berths in James Bay, St Helena approximately thirty times per year. The RMS Saint Helena was due for decommissioning in <a1_0>2010<a1_0/>. However, its service life has been extended indefinitely until <a2_0>the airport<a2_0/> is completed.
